property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves have an instinct for repair, an inherent understanding of how systems work, and a reputation for fearlessness. They're perfect candidates for the Fair's emergency response team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Arise. You have been anointed by the light. Go forth and fight without fear, for you shall be victorious."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Doomed Traveler dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He vowed he would never rest until he reached his destination. He doesn't know how right he was.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The demon had flown past the reach of Erebos's whip but not the point of the sun god's spear.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Expedition Raptor enters the battlefield, support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two other target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: His prowess gives the guildless hope that they can hold out against tyranny.

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.) Fiendslayer Paladin can't be the target of black or red spells your opponents control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Flickerwisp enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its wings disturb more than air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: During target opponent's next turn, creatures that player controls attack Gideon Jura if able. −2: Destroy target tapped creature. [0]: Until end of turn, Gideon Jura becomes a 6/6 Human Soldier creature that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your turn, your opponents can't cast spells or activate abilities of artifacts, creatures, or enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your superstitions and mumblings are useless chaff before my righteousness."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, tap target creature defending player controls."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There is power in abandon, but far more in control." - Warden Hixus, to Kytheon

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Lightwielder Paladin deals combat damage to a player, you may exile target black or red permanent that player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature with power 2 or less enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In these halls there is no pass or fail. Your true test comes with the first full moon."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Odric, Master Tactician and at least three other creatures attack, you choose which creatures block this combat and how those creatures block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fear holds no place in faith's battle plan."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Precinct Captain deals combat damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In troubled times, we all need someone to watch our back."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Relief Captain enters the battlefield, support 3. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to three other target creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes gestures of support are small. Sometimes not.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Support 2. (Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures.) Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Sea Gate may have fallen, but we still stand. We still fight." - Gideon Jura

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Whenever Sun Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A blazing sun that never sets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Idealism fits him better than his armor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless they discard a land card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Icefall Regent enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as you control Icefall Regent. Spells your opponents cast that target Icefall Regent cost {2} more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Ior Ruin Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Ior Ruin Expedition and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it. Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target player draws a card, then discards a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.) You may look at the top card of your library any time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I could see in the other mage's eyes that he'd thought of it too. Then it became a race to exploit the knowledge first."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Windrider Eel gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The best spot to hook one is right behind the gills." - Rana Cloudwake, kor skyfisher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why would I kill you all? Who then would be left to worship me?"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Deathbringer Regent enters the battlefield, if you cast it from your hand and there are five or more other creatures on the battlefield, destroy all other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He is judge, jury, and executioner because he killed them all." - Bishop Cawle of Elgaud

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blue spells and red spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. {1}{B}: Regenerate Nightscape Familiar.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nightscape masters don't stop at raising the spirit of a fallen battlemage. They raise the flesh along with it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Overseer of the Damned enters the battlefield, you may destroy target creature. Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The end is justified in being mean. Or something like that."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As they fought the Eldrazi, many vampires learned to live among humans. Others were unable to make the adjustment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an opponent controls seven or more lands, this spell costs {6} less to cast. Flying {R}: Avatar of Fury gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may have target creature get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shaman rattles not to inspire a battle fury but to drown out the shrieks of those fleeing the Eldrazi.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn. [0]: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Outrage deals 4 damage to target creature and 2 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Chandra never believed in using her "inside voice."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.) Whenever an opponent is dealt damage by a red instant or sorcery spell you control or by a red planeswalker you control, return Chandra's Phoenix from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +1/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's hard to shout "Shields up!" with a javelin in your chest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Dualcaster Mage enters the battlefield, copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It has been my experience that disasters like to strike in pairs."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature. Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Flametongue Kavu enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For dim-witted, thick-skulled genetic mutants, they have pretty good aim." - Sisay, captain of the Weatherlight

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some of the eleven minotaur clans of Mirtiin are expert crafters and learned philosophers. Others just like to hit stuff.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}, {T}, Exile two cards from your graveyard: Grim Lavamancer deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fools dig for water, corpses, or gold. The earth's real treasure is far deeper."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Guttersnipe deals 2 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He wants to watch Ravnica burn, one soul at a time.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Inferno Titan gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Whenever Inferno Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sparkmage shrieked, calling on the rage of the storms of his youth. To his surprise, the sky responded with a fierce energy he'd never thought to see again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}{R}{R}: Put a blaze counter on target land without a blaze counter on it. For as long as that land has a blaze counter on it, it has "At the beginning of your upkeep, this land deals 1 damage to you." (The land continues to burn after Obsidian Fireheart has left the battlefield.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.) Flying {R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bloodthirst 2 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it.) Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Blood is holy to those whose god is War.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a color. Sudden Demise deals X damage to each creature of the chosen color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the Skyfang Mountains, one misstep can mean the end of an entire clan.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Untap Torchling. {R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling. {1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Volcanic Geyser deals X damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The common folk call it the breaking of the crust or the spilling of fire. Geomancers call it target practice." - Ryda, geomancer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may play an additional land this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An explorer's reward is a view of tomorrow's possibilities.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fertilid enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it. {1}{G}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Fertilid: Target player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffles.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a player casts a spell, you may put a +1/+1 counter on Forgotten Ancient. At the beginning of your upkeep, you may move any number of +1/+1 counters from Forgotten Ancient onto other creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its blood is life. Its body is growth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until end of turn, target creature gets +3/+3 and gains trample and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, draw that many cards."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To be counted among the warriors of Setessa's Leina Tower, you must not fear death, only failure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may put a quest counter on Khalni Heart Expedition. Remove three quest counters from Khalni Heart Expedition and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land. [+1]: Untap up to four target Forests. −7: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Oran-Rief Hydra. If that land is a Forest, put two +1/+1 counters on Oran-Rief Hydra instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Up to two target creatures each get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show your enemies as much mercy as they would show you." - Surrak, the Hunt Caller

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may create a 4/4 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the land is angry, so are they." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, choose one - • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. • You gain 2 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more lands, put four +1/+1 counters on Scute Mob.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Survival rule 781: There are always more scute bugs." - Zurdi, goblin shortcutter

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target player gains 8 life. Basic landcycling {1}{G} ({1}{G}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

property.value: When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life. When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Always carry two spears." - Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

property.value: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have target creature block Turntimber Basilisk this turn if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant land Enchanted land is a 6/4 green Elemental creature. It's still a land. When enchanted land dies, return that card to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains reach until end of turn. Untap it. (A creature with reach can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The most elegant solutions are found in nature. You just have to know where to look."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control eight or more lands, Woodborn Behemoth gets +4/+4 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It carries the hopes of Zendikar's embattled wilds on its mighty boughs.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, deathtouch When Baleful Strix enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its beak rends flesh and bone, exposing the tender marrow of dream.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample At the beginning of your upkeep, each player loses 1 life. Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Tyrant for each 1 life lost this way. Whenever a player loses the game, put five +1/+1 counters on Blood Tyrant.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is always a greater power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Rakdos-controlled neighborhoods, everyone is part of the show.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player mills two cards. Then you put a creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If you want to wreak havoc above, sometimes it's best to look below.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+3]: Destroy target noncreature permanent. −2: Gain control of target creature. −9: Nicol Bolas, Planeswalker deals 7 damage to target player or planeswalker. That player or that planeswalker's controller discards seven cards, then sacrifices seven permanents.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target creature. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nicol Bolas doesn't distinguish between servants and victims.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature. Discard two cards: Soul Ransom's controller sacrifices it, then draws two cards. Only your opponents may activate this ability.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like most features of Grixis, the obelisks that remain from the time of Alara now exist only for dark exploitation.

property.name: Rules
Flavor
property.value: The blade glows only for Zendikar's chosen.

property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {R}. Talisman of Indulgence deals 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living." - Olcot, Rider of Joffik

property.value: Dragonskull Summit enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain. {T}: Add {B} or {R}.

property.value: Drowned Catacomb enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp. {T}: Add {U} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no height above Grixis that is free from the stench of death.

property.value: Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield tapped. When Smoldering Spires enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. {T}: Add {R}.
